Nếu ai ở bãi cháy thì mình thấy vị trí của khách sạn là nằm đúng ở giữa luôn, nên đi lại qua sun world, bãi tắm hay qua khu cái dăm thì thấy gần.

Lúc mình đến nhận phòng thì nhân viên đưa mình lên phòng và phòng đó đang có người ngủ. Tối không có nước nóng để tắm tuy nhiên view khá đẹp đồ ăn sáng cũng ổn nhưng phục vụ không được chuyên nghiệp cho lắm.
Căn phòng tuyệt đẹp với view vịnh hạ long siêu đỉnh. Buổi sáng dậy sớm ngắm được bình minh ngay từ trong phòng. Mọi thứ ở đây đều rất tuyệt vời.

Nhà mình đi 5 người ở 1 phòng, ban đầu được xếp cho phòng ở tầng 1 mình còn nghĩ sẽ không nhìn được gì nhưng vẫn nhìn ra được biển nhé, phòng sạch sẽ, giường nằm 3 người còn rộng, có bồn tắm, vòi sen, vòi xịt đầy đủ (góp ý chút nên lắp vòi xịt phía bên phải bồn cầu vì đa số mọi người thuận tay phải nhé), trong phòng có một màn hình tivi rất lớn, có internet nên mình tha hồ bật nhạc, xem phim luôn )

Khách sạn có xe đạp miễn phí nên có thể đạp xe ra bãi biển hoặc có thể thuê dich vụ xe điện ra cảng tuần châu với giá vô cùng rẻ. Tầng 5 ăn buffet buổi sáng được bố trí vô cùng đẹp mắt, view nhìn ra vịnh hạ long vô cùng đẹp. Tầng thượng có 1 khu vườn nhỏ rất xinh xắn cũng rất đẹp để ngồi uống nước ngắm vịnh. Đó là kỳ nghỉ tồi tệ nhất trong 15 ngày của chuyến đi việt nam của tôi. Hình ảnh bị lừa dối như một nơi đầy nắng. Căn phòng tôi đặt có mùi giống như một tòa nhà dưới lòng đất và không có chút ánh sáng mặt trời nào. Tôi muốn được trevlka hoàn lại tiền, nhưng việc kết nối với nhân viên tư vấn không hề dễ dàng. Cuối cùng, tôi phải trả thêm phí và ở nơi có nắng, nhưng các nhân viên rất khó chịu vì nói chuyện với nhau với giọng điệu chế nhạo, biết rằng họ là người nước ngoài không hiểu tiếng việt. Cho đến bây giờ tôi mới chỉ trả tiền cho agoda, nhưng tôi đã trả tiền cho trevlka vì nó rẻ hơn, nhưng tất cả những gì còn lại là cảm giác tôi bị lừa dối. Tôi không muốn sử dụng ứng dụng này và khách sạn này nữa.

Vị trí lưng đồi, hơi buồn nhưng view đẹp. Khách sạn trang trí khá đẹp. Nhiều vị trí chụp ảnh rất chill. Nhiều cây cảnh đẹp. Có tầng 5 và tầng thượng ăn uống chụp ảnh rất đỉnh. Xe điện thuê, nhưng xe đạp miễn phí. Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ và chi phí rất ok.

Thời tiết 38-40 độ nhưng điều hoà hỏng, đáng nhẽ khách sạn nên check phòng trước khi bàn giao cho khách. Giá thì cao nhưng không có nhà vệ sinh trong phòng, phòng nhỏ chật.... Tệ không có gì diễn tả nổi. Ra nhà nghỉ ngủ có lẽ sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi mà giá cả phải chăng hơn

Vị trí cách bãi biển (tắm được) tầm 3km. Cách chợ cái dăm 600m. Xung quanh tiện ích đầy đủ. Gia đinh mình ở đây 2 ngày thấy rất tuyệt cơ sở vật chất 5 sao. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, bể bơi không quá rộng nhưng trên tầng 25 view rất đẹp. Có phòng vui chơi trẻ em nhưng nhỏ (hình như không bật điều hoà nên rất nóng) ăn sáng rất ngon. Cả nhà mình đếu khen nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện.
Nhân viên hỗ trợ rất tốt, ks đẹp, vị trí hơi xa bãi
Nhà tôi có 4 người, ở phòng 2 giường rất thoải mái, view biển đẹp, chill. Nếu khách sạn có thêm xe điện đưa đón khách ra bãi tắm miễn phí nữa thì sẽ tiện cho khách hơn nhiều nè.

Khách sạn sạch sẽ thủ tục nhanh,đồ ăn gọi của ks về phòng cũng rất ngon và chỉnh chu có phòng tập gym mở từ 6h30 sáng đến 8h30 tối ,bể bơi ,cf trên tầng 25 .mỗi tội nhà vệ sinh mùi thoát nước hơi khó chịu ,sữa tắm nước rửa tay của khách sạn mùi hơi kì,kiểu nó cứ sao sao ấy ko được thơm ,khách sạn nên đổi mùi sữa tắm và nước rửa tay thì sẽ okla hơn ạ !
Mọi thứ đều ổn mình sẽ quay lại vote cho khach sạn 5 sao
Cơ sở dvu tốt , nvien nhiệt tình , tất cả trong khuôn viên khách sạn rất đẹp
Tuyệt vời .sạch sẽ nv hỗ trợ nhiệt tình nhanh nhẹn
Khi ngồi chờ checkin thì bạn lễ tân có mang nước chờ cho tất cả mọi người trừ đoàn nhà mình . Chắc thấy đoàn nhà mình toàn người nhà quê
Okeelaaaa 10 điểm, mn nên đặt phòng ở đây nha. Giá hợp lý mà phòng đẹp ạ
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, khách sạn dạch sẽ

Chúng tôi ở the watson trong ba đêm. Mặc dù vị trí không quá gần các điểm tham quan chính, nhưng nơi này nằm ở một khu vực yên tĩnh. Nhân viên, bao gồm cả nhân viên lễ tân và quầy bar, đều thân thiện, chu đáo và luôn mỉm cười. Bữa sáng có nhiều lựa chọn, mặc dù cá nhân tôi thấy món phở hơi mặn. Hồ bơi rất đẹp, nhưng thật không may, nước khá lạnh. Phòng của chúng tôi rộng rãi và thoải mái. Tuy nhiên, cửa không cách âm nên chúng tôi có thể nghe thấy tiếng ồn từ bên ngoài vào ban ngày. Rất may là công trình đã dừng vào ban đêm nên chúng tôi có thể ngủ ngon.
Mình đặt cho sếp người hàn. Sếp có vẻ hài lòng. Khách hàng sang xịn mịn và khách sạn không bị ảnh hưởng nhiều từ bão. Nếu có dịp sẽ quay lại
Phòng khách sạn sạch sẽ, buffet sáng hơi ít món. Sảnh khách sạn lớn và sạch sẽ và khách sạn check out quá sớm so với nơi khách check-in 14h và check-out 11h

Mình đến sau 1 tuần bão yagy càn quét hạ long. Thật không thể ngờ chỉ sau 1 tuần tất cả mọi thứ đều trở lại bình thường, đường phố dần sạch sẽ, nhiều cửa hàng mở cửa trở lại. Thật đáng khâm phục người dân quảng ninh. Ngày xưa có anh quảng ninh tán mà không biết trân trọng, bây giờ tiếc quá. Nói về khách sạn thì nằm ở vị trí trung tâm cách cảng sun tầm 10 phút nên rất dễ dàng di chuyển. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, view đẹp nhưng điểm trừ là điều hoà kêu to quá. Nhân viên lễ tân niềm nở nhẹ nhàng, tận tình giúp đỡ. Nhân viên khu tầng 2 nhà hàng phục vụ khách rất tận tình chu đáo, đoàn bạn mình toàn người đài loan tiếng trung của mình còn nhiều hạn chế, nhân viên nhà hàng đã rất nhiệt tình giới thiệu bằng tiếng trung cho họ. Thật sự đã có một trải nghiệm rất ưng ý tại khách sạn này.
An nhiên, tiện nghi, nhiều dịch vụ tiện ích
Khách sạn mới đẹp, mọi thứ đều ok không có gì để chê. Ngay cạnh khách sạn là quán cafe 198x khá chill.

Trải nghiệm 3 ngày 2 đêm tại khách sạn (2 vợ chồng em bé) nhân viên lễ tân bellman rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện luôn hỗ trợ khách hàng. Các bạn lễ tân tận tình hỗ trợ mình check-in nhận phòng sớm check-out phòng muộn hơn xíu (do con mình bị say xe) mình nhờ khách sạn gửi lời cám ơn của mình đến bạn nam lễ tân trực ngày 23/8/2024 lúc 9h sáng bạn nữ lễ tân trực cùng ngày lúc 12h hỗ trợ mình trong lúc check out phòng, thanh toán giải quyết phát sinh. Mình rất hài lòng phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, view biển. Có cửa kính, ban công ra bên ngoài. Đầy đủ tiện ích buffet sáng. Quầy đồ ăn nước uống đa dạng salad, xôi, bánh mì, bò hầm, mỳ ý, đồ nguội.. Món chính tráng miệng thay đổi theo ngày. Ngày 22/8 món chính có gà nướng kèm sốt để ngoài (khá ngon, dễ ăn), phở bò, bún cá. Tráng miệng sữa chua cùng các loại bánh ngọt, hoa quả. Ngày 23/8 món chính thay bằng cá basa nướng (ăn bị khô), bún sườn măng chua, phở gà. Tráng miệng chè hoa quả, bánh ngọt, hoa quả (cũng thay đổi theo ngày nhé) tối 22/8 mình có ăn tối tại tầng 2 khách sạn (pavilion restaurant) lúc 19h. Nhân viên niềm nở, thân thiện, có phục vụ ghế cho em bé. Đồ ăn mình gọi có mỳ xào hải sản (mỳ xào với trứng, rau củ và rất nhiều tôm mực. Mực ăn hơi dai) mỳ ý sốt bò băm (vợ mình em bé ăn. Vợ mình khen oke, hợp khẩu vị) nem hải sản (chiên vàng đều, nóng ròn vàng rụm, ngập nhân) pizza bò (nhân đầy đặn). Đồ ăn lẫn giá đều ok, điểm trừ là lúc đầu mình đến do quán không có khách nên không bật điều hoà nên rất nóng, mình ướt hết cả áo. Tối 23/8 vợ mình có đi spa tại khách sạn. Khá oke, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Đang được giảm giá 5 nên chỉ còn 570k cho 75 phút massage toàn thân. Góp ý với khách sạn là nhân viên buồng phòng dọn dẹp buổi sáng nên sử dụng đàm có kèm dây đàm để truyền thông tin cho nhau dọn dẹp các phòng bên dãy hành lang xin hãy thật nhẹ nhàng nhất có thể . Hai ngày liền đều ầm ầm từ sáng sớm tiếng đàm, rồi tiếng nhân viên nói chuyện với nhau ở ngoài rất khó chịu, làm tỉnh cả ngủ luôn ý ((
Khách sạn rộng rãi, sạch, đẹp. Phòng rất ok mọi người nhé. Mình đến sớm mà các bạn nhân viên rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ check in sớm luôn. Lễ tân rất niềm nở.
View đẹp , nhân viên thân thiện hỗ trợ nhiệt tình

Phòng sạch đẹp hơn cả hình nhân viên nhiệt tình, view siêu đỉnh! sẽ quay lại sớm!
View phố và biển rất đẹp, dịch vụ tốt, buffe rất ngon.

Bể bơi y ảnh, ngoài đời nhìn bé lắm, không đủ bơi, cho trẻ con nghịch nước thì ok. Trên app ghi tặng matxa 15p, nhưng thực tế thì nhân viên bảo là thông tin sai nên chuyển sang ngâm chân 15p. This hotel is a gem!!!! i m so glad that i booked this hotel! this hotel gives a very welcoming feel right from the moment i arrived. Friendly staff and they all spoke good english. This property is pretty new here. The rooms are comfortable and big. There is a kitchen. However, i am not sure about the cleanliness of the pool. It is very small and i was worried about the hygiene as it doesnt look like its maintained regularly. I am not sure if oct is a low season in halong bay, there is close to no one around here. It is also a 3 to 5 min taxi ride to the main attractions. But taxi here is very accessable and cheap. Staffs are very nice.
Everything was good except there is a short term renovation next door while we were there. Manager did apologize to guests when they arriveat to check in the property.

What a great hotel. Huge rooms. Fantastic value for money and chow our host couldn t have done more to make our stay perfect. This is a quiet spot, but it s close enough to the busier part of town. Easy walking distance to the beach.
Personnel compétent et agréable

Everything was great. The rooms were very big and everything worked well, kids loved the tv with youtube. Manager was great and very responsive on whatsapp chat, for example i wanted to confirm the breakfast times at 8pm and received a response right away. The area was very quiet which was odd as it was close to everything including the cable car. We think it must have been the low season and everyone else might have just been out on cruises. Staff on site were very responsive and helpful, everything we needed was easy to communicate despite the language barrier. Perhaps people who want someone who speaks their native language to be on hand 24/7 should holiday close to home. I was able to easily inform the cleaning staff that we didn t need our room made up just water, toilet paper and bin change. My husband got the wifi password from the front desk from the lovely non english speaking man who also helped us with our bags. He interacted with our kids in the lift without needing to speak, everyone was smiling and happy. We enjoyed the breakfast, they made the eggs fresh for us and offered pho also made fresh. We found a place nearby that rents bikes for a few dollars so got a big family bike for 100baht for 1h20mins. Good pub nearby that serves large meals. Lunch cruise was great, we saw a lot and noticed that the boat and practices and procedures were much better and safer than other companies. Boat was in immaculate and very safe entry and exit unlike other companies.
새로오픈한 곳이라 부족한것은 있지만 가격대비 좋다. 아직 주변상가들이 활성화가 되지 않아서 불편했지만 앞으론 기대가 되는 곳이다. 사이공플라자 호텔 마주편 이라 알고있으면 편하다. 새로만든지역이라 첫날 찾는데 불편했다.

The hotel manager was super helpful. I recommend talking to the front desk about limo and private car services to and from nearby services. Also, i recommended checking with them for the boat tours and asking about more affordable options if you are not interested in the more expensive packages.

Nếu app rõ ràng ngay từ lúc đặt thì mọi chuyện sẽ tốt hơn.

Resort có bãi biển riêng nên mặc dù dịp nghỉ lễ cũng không quá đông đúc. Khu hill villa xa khu ăn sáng, mặc dù có xe điện đưa đón tuy nhiên vào những ngày đông đúc bạn sẽ phải chờ một chút. Hài lòng với kỳ nghỉ.

Firstly tuan chau island is an unfinished wasteland. 98 of people have the right idea, arrive by coach take a cruise and leave again by coach as soon as theyre off the boat. Theres no public restaurants, everywhere is damaged or half finished the theme park on the island looks like a walking dead set. As for this hotel, the private beach is across a road and any anyone can use it, there are no open rwstaurants at the hotel only a breakfast room, the loinge is an empty (no furniture) undecorated room, the bar doesnt exist, there is nowhere in the day tome or evening to get food or even a bottle of water. There is another pool being built adjacent to the existing all of the current pool is covered in dust and dirt and workers are drilling and cutting from 0700 each day. You have to walk through this building site to get to the beach (which isnt worth going to, has no beds or chairs ahd the couple of shack bars alongnthere are run down or abandoned.

The staff is exceptionally kind and always willing to assist, including the security team, who were very helpful. It was a truly delightful experience. While there is some ongoing construction, i look forward to seeing the improvements once it s completed!

The staff, including the security team, were so kind and always ready to help, which made my stay really enjoyable. Even though there s some construction going on, i can t wait to see how everything turns out once it s done!

If this is your first time visiting viet nam, please read as our first time in viet nam, we did not know what to expect. We saw tuan chau and thought a beach front resort would be really fun. That being said, tuan chau island itself is very limited. There is few dining options, few shopping areas, and overall it doesn t encapsulate the culture as well as we would have expected. The hotel itself was very nice, the rooms were spacious and clean, the pool was very nice - the beach however is not the cleanest, the water is dirty, and i would not recommend this resort for a beach vacation. That being said the hotels proximity to the marina made for an easy transfer for our boat tour. I ve seen some reviews saying the staff didn t speak english well we managed well enough with basic phrases and google translate. The staff was very kind and accommodating to the best of their ability. If you are expecting everyone to know english in a foreign country . I think you have some personal reflection to do before traveling. Overall, the hotel was nice, but as my first time in viet nam i would not recommend staying here. I definitely want to go back and actually stay in hanoi. But our boat tour through ha long bay was a must! definitely make sure to do a boat through ha long bay. And if this isn t your first time in viet nam, you ve already experienced the culture, and you re just looking for a nice hotel with a pool and a good view, this is a great choice.

We had a wonderful vacation in here. I really enjoyed the fresh air at the resort, it has a beautiful beach, it is very clean and quite peaceful. The reception staff were very enthusiastic and supportive, providing us with a lot of useful information about the surrounding facilities, we were really warmly welcomed during our stay here. Although the hotel is in the process of upgrading, our room had a very nice view of the sea. We will definitely come back next summer.
Hotel en travaux, sans piscine ! nous etions les seuls dans l hotel !!!
This property only catered for the local or asian market, absolutely not the western market

The resort has a peaceful, cool atmosphere that s perfect for relaxing. The rooms are new and spotless, which made my stay very comfortable. What i loved most was waking up and just taking a few steps to the beach for some sunbathing. It s incredibly convenient!

Beautiful, comfortable stay in secluded private area. The rooms were clean, there was a great air con, the beach side villa rooms had a view of the archipelago through the palm trees, dinner was reasonably priced for a resort, poolside towel provision, porter service, lovely stroll along the beach with beach bars with a great vibe. Breakfast had decent options with a chef to make omelettes. We were able to check in early even though we didn t prearrange with no fuss at all. Friendly staff.
Everything is very good and high quality!
Quiet rooms with fresh air and greenery all around the beach is clean and beautiful the staff are friendly and enthusiastic, even though we had some difficulty communicating

Breathtaking location for ha long bay. Customer service made check run smoothly and helped to bring luggage directly to room. Love that they offer 24 hour private shuttle to mainland and have facial recognition to be able to go back and forth from main land making things run efficiently. The rooms were clean, modern, and balcony view was beautiful. Buffet was delicious and had a variety of food well seasoned along with view of the ocean. Many activities to do on island from pool, gym, spa, and pickleball. Only compliant is that the jacuzzi didn t work at spa when i went in evening. Prices were affordable for stay and 5 star treatment. The steakhouse restaurant had great customer service, delicious food, and amazing atmosphere with lighting for dinner time.
Great
Wonderful hotel. Only wish that they answer the listed phone numbers. It was a surprise that the phone number listed by vinpearl was not answered properly.

Wow a huge hotel with a lot of rooms. The service was excellent. Great eating in options. This hotel is on an island so you need to plan your day to get back on boat etc that only run every 30 mins. Given the amount of people this hotel can have there was a lot of noise at night and early in the morning.
직원도 친절하고 호텔컨디션도 매우 좋았음 여행의 막바지라 휴식이 필요했는데 잘 쉬었다 감 경관도 좋고 저녁 레스토랑 음식도 좋았고 비수기라 그런지 원래 그런건지 모르겠지만 조식은 생각보다 단촐했음 아무튼 다음에 또 갈 기회가 생기면 갈 의향은 있음
This hotel is well located. The view to the islands is great from this hotel. The staff were very attentive and courteous. A great experience overall
It s a gorgeous hotel with nice amenities. However, it does not answer the listed phone numbers. It was a hassle.

Attractive, self contained resort with high end furnishings, room space and facilities. The ferries are not too frequent, so you do need to make time for commuting to and from the main land. Staff are good however were a little slow with some communication. Otherwise a great stay for a few nights.
All good
Wir hatten 3 wunderbare tage in diesem luxuriösen hotel.
조용한 시간에 숙박을 했고 매우 조용하고 직원들이 친절했습니다. 단지 베트남 전반에 걸쳐 영어가 통하지 않아 힘들었서요,

My only issue was the way that other guests behaved in the buffet restaurant. Young children were allowed to handle food (and even taste and lick) and plates at the buffet and then not take it so that it was left for another unsuspecting guest. I got sick with mild food poisoning at the hotel which is what made me take notice of the behavior at the buffet. Staff should be supervising and also have a rule that no children under 12 should be serving themselves at the buffet.

Incredible resort. All the staff are amazing and can t recommend it enough! gorgeous island
Enjoyed a 4 day / 3 night stay. The outdoor pool is very spacious with beautiful scenery of the bay.
Fantastiskt för oss som barnfamilj. Fin pool och strand.
Remote-the hotel is on an island

Great from start to finish. Lovely staff, modern accommodation, spectacular views from rooms, excellent pool and beaches. Restaurants are slightly pricey relative to the surrounding area but to be expected for a hotel on an island.

What s an experience. Hotel beautifully allocated in one of the island, quick connection boat is provided by the hotel. Presentation of hotel and the staff amazing. Clean and very friendly!!!!! pack breakfast omg full bag of goodies! thank you so much

Great stay, but food beverage needs work we recently stayed at vinpearl and had a generally positive experience, but there s room for improvement in certain areas. The good stuff the views are stunning, the pool area is fantastic, and the staff are friendly and attentive, creating a relaxing, luxury atmosphere. The beers are also surprisingly affordable for a hotel of this standard. The not-so-good the food and beverage experience didn t match the hotel s luxury feel. While the breakfast buffet was quite good, the pho soup lacked authenticity, tasting more like fast food than a national dish. Dinner at the pavillion restaurant didn t meet expectations either. While the staff were friendly, service was inconsistent wine glasses weren t refilled, dishes arrived out of sync, and tables weren t cleared properly. It lacked the attention to detail you d expect from a 5-star property. Lunch by the pool was similarly disappointing. The spring rolls were fine, but the club sandwich arrived cold and soggy, and the fries were lukewarm. Waiting 30 minutes for this, with no cutlery or napkins provided, added to the frustration. Despite these hiccups, the handwritten note from the general manager addressing concerns was a nice touch. Would we stay here again? yes but we d eat out every night and stock up on snacks at circle k. Vinpearl gets many things right, but its food and beverage service has more in common with fawlty towers than fine dining.
Wonderful resort stay.

Top quality resort. 90 minute hot stone massage was the best i ever had, special thanks to my masseuse. Tour was easily booked for a day cruise on halong bay. Fantastic staff from the front dest to the cheery cleaning crew.
This place is like paradise on earth. It was a really good experience.

We booked the executive suite which was a nice room but the hotel service was lacking. There was zero personalization, we felt like cattle being herded through breakfast. Breakfast is all self-service, there is zero personalization. They don t even seat you upon arrival, you are left on your own to walk around in a crowded dining area to find an empty table after theyscan you when you enter the restaurant there was only 1 working coffee machine at breakfast so very long line just to get coffee. They never removed dirty dishes from table, just let them keep pile up. We had dinner in the pavillion and had to get up more than once to find the wait staff so we could order. The spa service was also lacking. Typically upon arrival at a spa you are led to a private, serene room where you are served tea and you relax for a few minutes before your treatment begins. At the vinpearl, they have you sit in a public hallway upon arrival where they serve tea and ask you to fill out a questionnaire while other guests shuffle past you. Once you finish the questionnaire they usher you to the massage room that has a connecting dressing area. The masseuse didn t even leave the room while we were undressing. The massage itself was good but the experience leading up to and following the massage lacked serenity or personalization. This was just another example of how we felt like cattle being herded through a process. We spent 5 nights at the vinpearl and never once were we made to never
Nice for a few quiet days relaxing with great pools and restaurants
Great staff
Beautiful property however starting to show some signs of age and unfortunately my stay was ruined by incompetence of the staff
飯店距離下龍灣本島五分鐘船程 每20分鐘一班有接駁船 整座飯店看似整修過 豪華漂亮 可悠閒散步海灘 還有超大泳池 四周庭園極美 早餐也好吃 真是個人間天堂 缺點 窗簾灰塵太多 導致過敏

The property was immaculate and the staff were all very friendly, knowlegable, helpful and fluent in english. The only problem we encountered was our room temperature was very hot and i could not adjust the thermostat.
Spacious room with a fantastic view. Very good service.
Top hotel in ha long city, quang ninh. The hotel is located in a beautiful location with high investment. Especially friendly and professional staff.
Nice and friendly service

We stayed here for 2 nights while touring halong bay. Rather than taking an overnight cruise, we did a private day tour (the resort helped ys to arrange) and stayed at vinpearl. Pictures on line looked great, but honestly they didnt do justice. The resort, rooms, restaurants and staff all exceeded our expectations. Certainly would recommend for anyone wanting a 5 star stay!!
Excellent base for a stay in halong
An extremely beautiful resort. The staff is excellent and accommodates for everything. The room was amazing.
The resort is simply beautiful. The beaches are private and quiet

The room was very quiet and the bed was extremely comfortable. Beautiful property, but food options are limited and expensive. Overall, wonderful experience and the staff was phenomenal. Would definitely recommend.
Excellent luxury hotel experience. Wide variety of food available and huge outdoor pool with lots of activities. Brilliant service.
Good service
This hotel is a must stay at. Our stay was three days. Next time i will stay many more days. The food was incredible. The views were stunning.

Wonderful resort with breathtaking view from our room. Room is very clean, nice and comfortable. The staffs are very attentive, polite and helpful. Got our breakfast coffee made by mr. Huy thắng, very appreciate with the care by the staffs here. We love here so much that we extended our stay for another 2 days. The only thing need to be improved is the restaurant here is a little pricey for dinner and didn t have much choices, had to go out for dinner. Other than that, we are really love this resort. Will come back again soon.
View of the islands

Beautiful resort on a small island with well taken care gardens, beach and swimming pools. The breakfast buffet was impressive with so many options available. Most of the service staff are lovely and so helpful, especially staff in the bars/restaurants and the staff managing luggages to and from the resort island. My room was comfortable with partial pool view. There are room for improvements with the reception area when guests arrive. I waited for 15 mins, while 3 out of the 5 staff behind the counter seemed to be doing other things than serving guests. When i finally was served, i was told those staff were not reception staff . There was also no queue and people just push in. I saw the same crowd at the reception when i left, which clearly show they are in serious need of more reception staff. The food at the restaurant was also incredibly expensive, at least 5 times higher compared to food outside the resort. If food prices were more reasonable, there maybe more guests having dinner in the resort rather than going back to land for dinner.

We stayed 5 nights in july, which we learned is the peak summer season for families to take a vacation, hence there were a lot of children around with no adult pools. The facilities were poor. The property was probably build to a high vietnamese standard, but shortcuts were taken and it was not up to western standard. A bathroom shaver mirror was bent by a previous guest and when i asked for it to be replaced, it was just bent straight. Not the standard you expect from a supposed 5 star place. The pool was good, mt the barman was great and the f b director david was wonderful to speak to. All in all we would not return, given comparable service and quality that you can receive of 5 star other properties in se asia.
Whole experience was great. Had a lovely meal in the pavilion, and breakfast in the buffet was also great, no complaints
Perfect hotel, very luxury and great hotel. Location at the middle of the beach.
Khach san rat dep, nam tren dao. Khach san cach xa ha noi khoang 150 km

You have to take a very short ferry to get to the private island (provided by the hotel). The grounds and pool are gorgeous, the event planning concierge was very affordable and easily arranged everything. I took off one star (i would take off a half if possible) because the food was only decent. Even the private dining food wasn t all that much better than the buffet. Certainly not terrible, just decent food. I highly suggest you rent a boat for ha long bay, that was incredible kevin/hieu was our guide and highly recommended. Also, make sure you put a deposit down on your room if you plan on drinking alcohol at all. Otherwise, they do not keep tabs open and you have to pay every single time you order a cocktail very annoying.

What an incredible resort! staff went above and beyond and the rooms were incredible with amazing views. Highly recommend!

Wow what a stunning hotel in a stunning location! would recommend to anyone!
This is an island. You have to take the ferry out that is free for guest. However the steps are too steep. Not good for elderly adults. But overall good.

This hotel is on its own island. The rooms with a terrace exit are exceptional. The food options vary from traditional dishes to the exceptional italian restaurant inside the hotel. The laundry service is exceptional. It s its own self contained island and everyone that is there is supposed to be there. The breakfast buffet is memorable. The hotel and staff have options to accommodate every kind of need. There was constant follow up on how the experience be is going and any concerns are immediately addressed. This is one of the most luxurious hotels i have ever been a guest at. Don t forget sunscreen, the pool is large and the bike riding area is huge. This experience will not disappoint.
Love my time at vinpearl. Will definitely be back.
This is a very beautiful hotel, it s a unique experience, as it s situated on its own island. The staff are very friendly and the food at all of the restaurants is first class

Absolutely unreal from start to finish. Was very pleased on all aspects and will definitely be back again. Food was excellent. Ferry shuttle was always running, pool was amazing, beautiful views, sauna/steam room was a great touch. Loved it all!!

This is a beautiful hotel on its own island. The rooms and bathrooms were an a-plus. The breakfast buffet was delicious with something for everyone. We planned a cruise to the bay of wonders, which we booked through the hotel, and is an absolute must see. My only negative comment is that the steamroom and sauna for men wasn t working.
Beautiful place
Very friendly place mr who greeted us and was very kind
Excellent stay! amazing views, wonderful staff, super clean and high class.

Dear sir why did no one tell me that i couldn t bring food to the island and i had to pay extra for it after so many correspondences? because we booked 10 rooms. So i specifically notified the name of each room. Why was not ready when i arrived at the hotel? also front desk charged 2 times for our dinner buffet.please make sure refund. Fion from taiwan

The hotel is really nice and in a very nice location, but that s about it. Bad service, no staff can speak english, despite it being an international hotel, staff know nothing, no manager can speak english, and there is no service at all. It is such a poor standard of service that it is indescribable. If you want to have a proper service and a relaxed place, then you should not choose this hotel. Incompetent employee and staff all around. I will never recommend this hotel to anyone, ever.
We had an pleasant stay at the vinpearl resort! got a big rooftop terrace. Great staff.
This is a great place to stay.

A wedding that was more like a rave interrupted our stay . The staff was horrified , we were horrified . Th wedding was allowed to play music outside for hours . Been to many outdoor concerts but not this loud . The wedding took over the hotel and was disrespectful to employees and everyone . Horrible experience .

Dette hotellet var fantastisk! et nydelig hotell-resort på en øy helt for seg selv. Vi overnattet her i to netter før vi dro på cruise. Kan virkelig anbefales. Vi spiste en nydelig middag i paviljong restaurant hvor en meget hyggelig personell serverte oss med en eksepsjonell service )

Däremot önskar jag att andra gäster kunde ta hänsyn till hygien vad gäller att hosta i armvecket för att undvika smitta, speciellt i restaurangen, samt att childrens club personalen inte släppte in barn med tydliga tecken ögoninflammation (som för övrigt är väldigt smittsamt). Annars var vår vistelse perfekt!

This is an amazing property!! top notch service, hospitality. The grounds are beautiful. Quiet and peaceful. The breakfast buffet was and room service food was excellent. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!!
Awesome hotel in an island. Relaxing pool vibe. Rooms would have been sound proofed though. It overall it was a real 5 star experience with super elegant set up.
I feel relax at this hotel. -)

The property is marvelously maintained. The buffet has food for everyone and the quality of ingredients are very high. Very big pools both inside and outside. Inside heated outside not. Wish they post a sign to say so.

I travel all over the world and ive never stayed at a hotel where everything was great. From the moment i stepped out of my taxi i was greeted by exceptional people with smiles on their faces. In 5 days i never opened a door because 2 staff members would beat me to it. The ferry boat that goes back and forth runs every 20 minutes and its only a 5-7 min ride. When you step off the little ferry boat, another staff member is waiting in a golf cart for you. And the grounds are incredible, with a beautiful fountain and waterfall at the entrance. The pools are exceptional, a private beach, a large indoor pool and nice fitness center. The buffets are a tad expensive but are huge with much to offer. The ambience of the entire estate was amazing. And a 5 star hotel with 75.00 a night rooms i just cant say enough about this place. I have never been treated so polite in all my years of traveling.

We were very pleased with our stay at the vin pearl resort. Lovely big property and very well kept. The staff were very friendly and attentive. They were willing to help you with anything you needed. The general manager kristof was so kind and friendly and helpful to us. I would recommend this hotel
Amazing property amazing staff loved it
Excellent and good area really a good area to stay i recommend everyone to visit that area

Food is awful!!!!!!!! avoid this hotel if you are planning on chilling on the island for your stay as the food is rubbish! we were also woken up at 5.51am by classical music playing full barst in our bathroom. This also happened to 2 other rooms in our party.

We stayed for 2 nights and loved this hotel. The rooms were great and had the best ocean view. Taking a ferry from the check in building to the hotel was an interesting experience. The hotel is huge with lots of dining options. We tried the dinner buffet one night, the service and food choice was really good. The next night we tried the ala la carte menu at a different restaurant. Both the times we found the food a bit bland but that s probably because we are used to having spicier food on a daily basis. We took a day ferry from the hotel and all the arrangements were done very well from booking to car transfer to the boat, etc. The service by everyone was excellent! will definitely return to this resort if i visit ha long again.

Vp is on its own island with a private beach and 3 pools. You check in on the mainland, then take their ferry to the resort. The resort itself is beautiful and enormous. There are 3 restaurants on site with 1 buffet restaurant that offers so much variety of food that we didn t find the need to get off the island. We really enjoyed our stay because it has the feel of being on a resort. The only feedback is make the indoor pool available during the day when iis too hot to swim outdoor and the outdoor pool available at night when the water cools at night.
The property is a good place however has very limited recreation and sports facilities. With an island so beautiful. The spaces could be utilized better.
Clean and excellent service. 24 hour boat to the island every 20 minutes. Helpful staff and there s even a clinic if you are unwell.

작은 섬 하나가 리조트임. 실내, 실외 수영장이 있어 아이들과 몇일 보내도 괜찮을 듯하다. 뷔페 식당이나 파빌리온 식당 음식도 깔끔하고 맛있다. 파빌리온 식당에서 해산물 요리를 먹고 가벼운 배탈 난 것은 옥의 티. 침구는 깨끗하고 객실 청소 잘해 주고, 경관이 아름답고, 시설 관리는 굉장히 잘하고 있음. 잘 정돈되어 있다는 느낌을 받음. 모든 직원이 친절하지만, 언어(영어) 소통에 어려움. 리셉션에서도 기본적인 언어 소통이 안되어 번역기 돌려야 하는 상황이 빈번했고, 어느 정도 소통이 되는 직원은 정말 적음. 영어 교육 절실히 필요함.
Beautiful property!
Amazing hotel, staff were superb as was breakfast.

Magnificent hotel out on its own island. We chose full board and regret this as i think the other two restaurants on the island had better food. There were many families with small children and therefore i do not recommend this for couples.
너무너무 좋았어요

Location of the property and the grounds are great and impossible to beat private beach, indoor and outdoor pool, 3 onsite restaurants etc. We stayed in an executive 1 bed suite, and in the half bath/guest bath, there s no towel hooks or towels provided. Overall resort looks like it s been around for 30 years. All the walls are beat up and property isn t maintained too well. The staff are attentive and great which made up for it. However, the other guests there are just awful. They re loud, don t understand personal space or manners, children are running around uncontrolled especially in the buffet, everyone coughs and sneezes without covering their mouth, people bump into eachother with no regard. Not sure if it s a cultural thing, but i was expecting a certain level of class and sophistication from a 5 star resort. This seemed like most guests were locals. Would probably recommend the is to others but would definitely reiterate the issues so one is to set their expectations accordingly.

We picked this property because it resides on an island and is very unique. We were looking to relax at a resort and enjoy some downtime. This hotel was perfect for that. The resort is large and beautiful, the pool was large, we enjoyed lots of swim time in the pool. Our rooms were facing the ocean view, and we can just walk down to the beach from our room within minutes. Definitely a 5-star property. A small negative was the staff were not very well verse in english, it was good that my sister could speak some vietnamese to help bridge the gap. Overall, our experience at vinpearl was great, a wonderful hotel to stay at and the price to stay there was very fair.

The natural environment was so beautiful. The service was great. But the interior design was old-fashioned, as if it had been built by a hotel. But the surrounding environment was so beautiful. I am satisfied.
Dịch vụ rất tốt so với giá phòng!

Chúng tôi ở lại 2 đêm, 5 người. Nhân viên rất thân thiện và chủ sở hữu thực sự hữu ích. Họ cung cấp cho chúng tôi một tour du lịch có tên quot du thuyền hà bình quot . Tôi đã cảnh giác vì tất cả các trò gian lận nhưng hóa ra nó thực sự tuyệt vời. Phòng sạch sẽ, không quá nhỏ, có vẻ ngoài hiện đại và sang trọng. Cửa của chúng tôi cần một chút nỗ lực để đóng. Ánh sáng được cố định để bạn có thể bật tất cả đèn hoặc chỉ đèn. Máy sấy tóc cũng được cố định bên trong phòng tắm nên thật rắc rối. Chăn được thay đổi hàng ngày nhưng chúng tôi thường tìm thấy một số bóng mờ nhỏ màu đen và các vật thể nhỏ màu đen không xác định (không phải côn trùng chắc chắn) trên giường của chúng tôi trong cả hai đêm. Tôi đã rất lo lắng khi phát hiện ra rằng tôi hầu như không thể ngủ vào đêm đầu tiên. Đêm thứ hai tôi chỉ nói f nó và đi ngủ. Chúng tôi không có nhiều lựa chọn trong bữa sáng vì họ nói rằng đó là mùa đông (ít khách) nhưng đồ ăn rất ngon.

Tuyệt vời, giá hợp lý, khách sạn mới nên đồ gì cũng mới. Minh rất thích sự ấm cúng nên chọn khách sạn này vì nội thất gỗ, phòng tắm kính đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên lễ tân với phục vụ cũng rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Nói chung là mọi người nên ở đây vì nó quá đẹp luôn .
Phòng đẹp sạch sẽ chất lượng .
Phòng khách sạn đẹp lắm. Mọi thứ rất oki
Khách sạn đẹp, phòng ok, nhân viên phục vụ tận tình, ngay gần sunworld tiện đi lại và ăn uống đủ thứ . Đáng để trải nghiệm
Phòng vô cùng sạch sẽ và gọn gàng, đồ ăn sáng ngon và đa dạng. Chắc chắn đây sẽ là nơi nghỉ dưỡng của mình trong những lần tới hạ long sau này
Khách sạn sạch sẽ. Gần trung tâm. Nhân viên phục phụ nhiệt tình
Rất rất hài lòng về khách sạn? gần sunworld, phục vụ nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ
Phòng mới, y hình, sạch sẽ, đồ ăn sáng ngon. Nhân viên nhiệt tình. Lần sau du lịch sẽ ghé tiếp

- khách sạn rất sang trọng với tone màu trắng chủ đạo và có vị trí ngay gần sun world hạ long park, phù hợp cho các bạn trẻ và gia đình muốn đến hạ long với mục đích chính là đi chơi công viên. - bạn lễ tân ca chiều tối (nam, mình không nhớ tên) rất thân thiện và luôn tươi cười với khách - phòng ốc sạch sẽ với nội thất gỗ rất thanh lịch, phòng tắm tốt, nước nóng khoẻ. Tone đèn trong phòng có thể đổi màu trắng - vàng và mình rất thích điều này - tuy nhiên nhân viên ca ngày chỉ thấy ngồi làm việc, khách qua lại không thấy chào hỏi gì. Nếu các bạn khai thác được khách đang cần gì, muốn gì, các bạn có thể mang lại nhiều doanh thu hơn cho khách sạn (ví dụ mời ăn sáng extra, thuê giùm xe máy, bán tour ra vịnh...) - mình ở 2 đêm và không có nhu cầu dọn phòng vào ngày thứ 2, nhưng tìm mãi không thấy biển do not disturb đâu. - set up mini bar trong phòng nhưng không có đồ uống gì bên trong. Khách sẽ happy trả tiền khi dùng đồ trong tủ lạnh và cũng tăng thêm doanh thu cho khách sạn mà nhỉ.

Khách sạn white crown tọa lạc ở con đường tuy nhỏ ơ thành phố hạ long nhưng vẫn có chổ để xe, khách sạn ở trung tâm thuận tiện đi tới các điểm du lịch, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, trang thiết bị mới, nhân viên phục vụ ân cần và chu đáo.

Mình nghĩ rằng đây là 1 chuyến đi tồi tệ về ấn đề đặt phòng. Bọn mình đã đặt phòng ở khách sạn trước và khi đến nơi thì không có phòng để ở. Lỗi là do bạn nhân viên khách sạn vì chúng mình đã gọi điện xác nhận, thậm chí nhắn tin qua zalo cho bên khách sạn rồi và khách sạn cũng đã okie với bọn mình rồi. Mình rất bực khi mình đến nơi không có phòng để ở thì khách sạn lại đỗ lỗi cho app, nhưng mình vẫn sẽ để good vì ông chủ đã tìm phòng và đưa bọn mình tới phòng mới. Đánh giá nhân viên 1 ạ
Nhân viên tuyệt vời, lần đầu đến hạ long mình mà hỏi gì đều hỗ trợ hết, cám ơn nhân viên và chủ khách sạn nhiều nhé, hẹn ngày gặp lại
Nhân viên tuyệt vời, ấn tượng bạn lễ tân ở đây, hỗ trợ khách hết mình, hẹn ngày gặp lại nhé!!!
Khách sạn mới và đẹp. Nhân viên thân thiện. Rất gần trung tâm nên thuận tiện. Tuyệt vời.
Ông chủ nhiệt tình phòng khá đẹp, thuận lợi di chuyển

Cơ bản là tốt, chấp nhận được. Gia đình tôi có 1 trẻ dưới 1 tuổi nên tôi có xem thông tin và có đặt phòng với thông tin trên app là có bồn tắm, tuy nhiên khi nhận phòng lại chỉ có phòng tắm đứng. Tôi có xuống hỏi lễ tân thì loại phòng tôi đặt đều không có bồn tắm...? vậy sao trên app lại để thông tin là có bồn tắm? nếu từ đầu không có thì tôi đã không đặt loại phòng này.
